lead_paragraph: Chile's internal revenue service said on Friday that it had filed a criminal complaint against disgraced former soccer boss Sergio Jadue for misrepresenting his income in a bid to avoid taxes.

headline.print_headline: Chilean Authorities Sue Ex-Soccer Boss for Tax Evasion
headline.main: Chilean Authorities Sue Ex-Soccer Boss for Tax Evasion

snippet: Chile's internal revenue service said on Friday that it had filed a criminal complaint against disgraced former soccer boss Sergio Jadue for misrepresenting his income in a bid to avoid taxes....
